name: CasinoBound
description:
How to Play

Select dice by clicking on them.  To reroll dice, select the ones you want to keep and press the Reroll! button.  You may only reroll once per turn.  Press the Defend! button to end your turn.

The matching system is similar to what might be found in a game like Yahtzee.  The following are the possible matches in ascending order of damage:

  • Pair
  • Three-of-a-kind
  • Full house (A three-of-a-kind and a pair)
  • Four-of-a-kind
  • Five-of-a-kind
  • Six-of-a-kind

The symbols on the dice represent the elemental types of the attacks, which will have a greater or lesser effect based on the type of enemy.  The following list shows the effectiveness, where the arrow points towards the weaker type.

  • Ice < Burn < Stone
  • Spark < Ice < Burn
  • Cutter < Spark < Ice
  • Bomb < Cutter < Spark
  • Stone < Bomb < Cutter
  • Burn < Stone < Bomb
Credits

The font used is Ultra by Astigmatic.

The music is Eerie Mausoleum by Visager.

The sound effects were made in Chip Tone.

Made in Godot Engine.
